invention-title: High-temperature gas cooled reactor helium and carbon dioxide double-working-medium circulating hydrogen-electricity co-production system
高温气冷堆氦气二氧化碳双工质循环氢电联产系统

abstract.p: The invention discloses a high-temperature gas cooled reactor helium and carbon dioxide double-working-medium circulation hydrogen-electricity co-production system. The system comprises a nuclear power station primary loop subsystem, a hydrogen production subsystem and a carbon dioxide circulation power generation subsystem. High-temperature helium of a nuclear power station sequentially enters the high-temperature superheater to release heat and the helium and carbon dioxide heat exchanger to release heat, steam of a hydrogen production system sequentially passes through the low-temperature superheater and the high-temperature superheater to absorb heat and then enters the solid oxide electrolyzer to react to generate hydrogen and oxygen, and the hydrogen and the oxygen are subjected to waste heat recovery through the low-temperature superheater. A compressed working medium of the carbon dioxide cycle power generation system enters the helium carbon dioxide heat exchanger for heat absorption and temperature rise and then is fed into the carbon dioxide turbine generator set for power generation, and exhausted gas is fed into the steam generator for heat release to generate steam. Water vapor electrolysis hydrogen production and supercritical carbon dioxide cycle power generation are combined, the hydrogen-electricity co-production mode of hydrogen production and power generation in sequence is achieved, and the device has the advantages of energy gradient utilization, low green hydrogen preparation cost, high cycle power generation efficiency, system compactness and the like.

本发明公开了一种高温气冷堆氦气二氧化碳双工质循环氢电联产系统，包括核电站一回路子系统、制氢子系统、二氧化碳循环发电子系统。核电站的高温氦气先后进入高温过热器放热和氦气二氧化碳换热器放热，制氢系统的蒸汽先后经过低、高温过热器吸热，然后进入固体氧化物电解器发生反应产生氢气和氧气，氢气和氧气通过低温过热器进行余热回收，二氧化碳循环发电系统的压缩工质进入氦气二氧化碳换热器吸热升温，再送入二氧化碳透平发电机组发电，排气送入水蒸汽发生器放热产生蒸汽。本发明将水蒸汽电解制氢与超临界二氧化碳循环发电相结合，实现了先制氢后发电的氢电联产方式，具有能量梯级利用、绿氢制备成本低、循环发电效率高、系统紧凑等特点。
